main event: A satellite-like object was observed in College Park, Georgia on May 2, 1965, for a duration of 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported to move in a southern course, The duration of the observation was consistent with a typical satellite passage, Multiple documents corroborate the sighting without photographic evidence, A witness described the object as exhibiting unusual characteristics including changes in direction, Project Blue Book concluded the sighting was characteristic of satellite behavior.
witness description: A civilian witness observed the object.
